short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this great game, you'll have to do everything you can to help command fighting bots around you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In this great game, you'll have to do everything you can to help command fighting bots around you. Build a robot from the available parts and fight in merciless battles. You can also play a 1v1 mode. Do whatever it takes to neutralize the enemy's bot. Figure out all of the game mechanics and have fun. We believe that you'll be able to enjoy the game to its fullest.

This extension provides additional games,

Providing users with more games to choose
